topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545c710c63687267ad1f0100#post_545c710c63687267ad1f0100
Well if you've got the time I could recommend Psyren. Or you COULD read all seven hundred chapters of Naruto if you're feeling a bit masochistic. Then there's Toriko. A goofy awesome series about FOOD. Though if I had to choose one to recommend then it would be Toriko.
